|blank_info = |website = |footnotes = }} 'Hot' () is a [[tambon]] (subdistrict)
of Hot District, in Chiang Mai Province,
Thailand. [http://www.thaitambon.com/ Thaitambon.com], Accessed April 30,
2010  In 2005 it had a total population of 3,313 people. The tambon
contains 6 villages.
categories: Populated places in Chiang Mai Province
